snippet: In the N.H.L.’s second season, great teams fall to poor teams, heroes stumble and the unsung become champions who lift the old silver chalice come June.
abstract: In the N.H.L.’s second season, great teams fall to poor teams, heroes stumble and the unsung become champions who lift the old silver chalice come June.

headline.main: No Second Chances in the N.H.L.'s Second Season
headline.print_headline: There Are No Second Chances in the N.H.L.’s Second Season
